  </div></div></span> <span id="popper_1" data-test="popper transition UpTransition UpTransitionIntro" data-show="" class="air3-popper air3-tooltip " style="display:none;"><div class="size-lg air3-popper-container"><div class="air3-popper-wrapper"><div class="air3-popper-inner"><!----> <div class="air3-popper-content"><div data-v-abdd572e="">No feedback yet</div> </div> <div data-popper-arrow="" data-test="popper-arrow" class="air3-popper-arrow"></div></div></div></div></span></span></li> <li data-test="total-spent" class="pr-3" data-v-abdd572e=""><div class="air3-badge-tagline" data-v-abdd572e=""><strong data-v-abdd572e="">$0</strong> <span data-v-abdd572e="">spent</span></div></li> <li data-test="location" class="pr-3 pt-2" data-v-abdd572e=""><div class="air3-badge-tagline" data-v-abdd572e=""><div class="air3-icon md" data-v-abdd572e="" data-test="UpCIcon"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" aria-hidden="true" viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img"><path vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke" stroke="var(--icon-color, #001e00)" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="1.5" d="M12 11.9a2.5 2.5 0 100-5 2.5 2.5 0 000 5z"></path><path vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke" stroke="var(--icon-color, #001e00)" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="1.5" d="M18.4 9.4C18.4 5.9 15.6 3 12 3 8.4 3 5.6 5.9 5.6 9.4c0 1.5.6 2.9 1.5 4.1 1.3 1.8 5 7.5 5 7.5s3.6-5.7 5-7.5c.7-1.2 1.3-2.5 1.3-4.1z"></path></svg></div>
      United States
    </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $30.00 - $50.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Expert</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>More than 6 months, Not sure</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-3" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">We're looking for a talented and passionate developer to join our team in building a revolutionary digital warranty system using NFT technology and smart contracts.
This is a project for one of my clients who is a co-founder of SSV labs.
In terms of the timeline, I'm aiming to complete the first version of the platform within 10 months or even sooner.
The Challenge
We're replacing the traditional paper-based warranty model with a secure, transparent, and efficient system powered by blockchain technology. This project will leverage NFTs and smart contracts to deliver a seamless warranty experience for both customers and manufacturers.

Your Role
As a key member of our development team, you'll be responsible for building and integrating a robust, user-friendly digital warranty system into our existing e-commerce platform. Your expertise in MERN stack development and Solidity will be crucial to bringing this innovative concept to life.

Key Responsibilities:
UI Enhancement: Update the existing user interface based on our detailed Figma prototype, creating a visually appealing and intuitive user experience.
[Figma Design]
https://www.figma.com/design/CqwFZHD6nNPRTOyNRAyT68/E-commerce-Grid?m=auto&amp;t=wWgZS7sMwcMI4r8V-6

Smart Contract Development:
Retailer Functions:
Implement smart contracts enabling retailers to purchase NFT warranty cards using Metamask upon receiving an order request.
Ensure gas fees are charged to the retailer, not the customer.
Allow retailers to set warranty information at the time of NFT purchase.
Utilize the safeTransferFrom() function of ERC721 tokens to send warranty cards to customers.
Generate and send unique token IDs to customers via email after purchase.
Customer Functions:
Allow customers to verify ownership by entering their unique token ID, using the ownerOf function for ERC721 soulbound tokens.
Display warranty period and other relevant information on the verification page.
Implement a decay mechanism for NFTs, ensuring they stop functioning after the warranty period or after redemption.
Integration: Seamlessly integrate the smart contract functionality into our existing e-commerce platform, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Testing &amp; Deployment: Participate in rigorous testing of the system to ensure its stability and functionality.
Documentation: Maintain clear and detailed documentation of the system's architecture, functionalities, and codebase.

Required Skills:
MERN Stack Expertise: Proficiency in MongoDB, Express.js, <span class="highlight">React.js</span>, and Node.js for front-end and back-end development.
Solidity Mastery: Strong experience with smart contract development on the Ethereum blockchain, including deep understanding of Solidity language.
ERC721 &amp; NFT Knowledge: Thorough familiarity with ERC721 standards and NFT functionality, including token creation, ownership management, and transfer mechanisms.
Email Service Integration: Understanding of email services and API integration for sending token IDs to customers.
Problem-Solving &amp; Attention to Detail: Ability to identify and solve complex technical problems, demonstrating exceptional attention to detail and code quality.

What We Offer:
Competitive Compensation: Salary based on experience and expertise.
Flexible Work Environment: We offer flexible working hours and remote work options.
Professional Development: Opportunities for continuous learning and career advancement.
Collaborative Culture: We believe in a collaborative and innovative work environment where your contributions are valued.

Apply Now:
If you're excited to be part of a revolutionary project at the intersection of blockchain technology and e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. 
We look forward to hearing from you!</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp JobAttrs"><!----> <div class="air3-token-wrap" class="air3-token-wrap" data-v-d8f62af2=""><button data-test="token" type="button" class="air3-token" data-v-d8f62af2=""><span class="highlight-color" data-v-d8f62af2="">web3.js</span></button></div> <!----></div> <ul class="d-flex align-items-center flex-wrap text-light text-base-sm mt-3" data-test="JobInfoClientMore"><li data-test="proposals-tier" class="pr-6 pt-3"><span class="font-weight-light mr-1">Proposals:</span> <strong>10 to 15</strong></li> <!----></ul></div></article> <!----><article data-ev-job-uid="1851371562635372416"     </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $20.00 - $50.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Intermediate</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-13" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">We are looking for a skilled <span class="highlight">React</span> developer to engineer a simple front-end for our new AI media webapp.

The front-end should be built with <span class="highlight">React</span> via Vite and incorporate AppKit to allow connection to a crypto wallet. The front-end must be engineered following current <span class="highlight">React</span> best practices and be as extensible and scalable as possible. We will provide an API with clearly documented methods for the front-end to interact with. 

Information wireframes are available upon application, and design wireframes will be available before the project begins. 

The job should be completed in 1 month from the start date.

We are looking for someone with extensive and demonstrable experience developing and launching <span class="highlight">React</span> webapps. Experience working with LLMs, AI, or crypto is a plus, but not necessary. Please be able to share a portfolio and github repos with example projects.

We are open to working with small teams, but we would prefer to work with an individual.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp       United States
    </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $25.00 - $50.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Expert</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>1 to 3 months, 30+ hrs/week</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-15" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">We are looking for a skilled <span class="highlight">React</span> and <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span> developer to help us update the user interface of a messaging application. The current version is functioning, but we need key updates to improve user experience and performance. If you have a strong attention to detail and a track record of delivering high-quality work on time, we want to hear from you.

What We Have Now:
* Users can submit text through a form.
* Users receive a series of messages in response, each from a different person.

What Needs to Be Fixed:
* Delayed Response Messaging: When users submit text, there is often a delay (~30 seconds) before receiving a reply. We need to display a confirmation message that the submission was received and that they should wait for a response.
* Submission Lock: Once users submit text, they should not be able to submit additional text until a response is received.
* Markdown Rendering: Some responses use markdown, and it is currently displayed incorrectly. This needs to be fixed to properly render the text.
* Reply Details: Each response should include the sender's name and title.
* Expandable Long Replies: Some responses are long, and while we have a truncation system, it needs improvement. We want to add a short summary under the truncated text and include an icon to indicate more content.

Requirements:
* Proficiency in <span class="highlight">React</span> and <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span>.
* Experience with UI/UX improvements.
* Familiarity with handling markdown in web applications.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Familiarity with Clean Architecture Principles

Future Opportunities:
This project is a test, but good work on this task could lead to ongoing work with us on additional projects.

How to Apply:
In your application, please include:

1. Examples of similar work you've done.
2. A brief description of how you'd approach solving the issues listed above.
3. Your availability and estimated timeframe to complete the job.

We value efficiency, clear communication, and timely delivery. If youre passionate about clean, functional UI and ready to tackle these challenges, wed love to hear from you!</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2=""     </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $15.00 - $40.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Expert</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-17" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">We are a fast-growing tech startup working on an innovative digital collaboration platform that helps remote teams work more efficiently using AI-driven task management. We are seeking a full-stack developer who can take ownership of both the front-end and back-end development for our web application. The ideal candidate should be skilled in building scalable systems and user-friendly interfaces, with a strong foundation in databases and cloud infrastructure.

Project Overview:
You will be working on a platform that integrates AI for predictive task management and automated workflows, aiming to streamline team collaboration for startups and enterprises alike. The platform's front-end is powered by Next.js (<span class="highlight">React</span>), while the back-end uses Node.js. We leverage Supabase and Postgres for the database layer to ensure smooth and secure data handling.

Your Key Responsibilities:
Design, build, and maintain robust front-end interfaces using Next.js, <span class="highlight">React</span>, and TailwindCSS.
Implement back-end functionality with Node.js, preferably using NestJS or another modern backend framework.
Set up and manage the application database using Postgres (via Supabase).
Integrate AI API solutions (such as OpenAI or Anthropic) to enhance platform features.
Ensure the application performs optimally, troubleshoot bugs, and deliver timely fixes.
Collaborate with our product team to define and implement new features based on user feedback.

What We're Looking For:
Strong expertise in <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span>.
Solid experience with <span class="highlight">React</span>, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks like TailwindCSS.
Experience with Node.js and backend frameworks (NestJS is a plus).
Proficient with SQL databases, especially Postgres and MySQL.
Hands-on experience with integrating AI APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic).

Bonus Skills:
Familiarity with AntDesign UI library.
Experience working with Supabase or similar backend-as-a-service tools.
Knowledge of modern ORMs like Drizzle or similar <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span>-based solutions.
Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp JobAttrs"><!----> <div       United States
    </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $18.00 - $45.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Intermediate</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>1 to 3 months, 30+ hrs/week</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-19" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">We're SkipLabs, a young American tech startup building some really cool, reactive products for engineers. Right now, were on the hunt for a <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span> pro to join our small but mighty team and help us test and build with our technology.

Heres the deal: were looking for someone based near Barcelona (since well have some in-person meetings), but most of the work can be done remotely. Ideally, youre fluent in English and comfortable with working closely with a team that's distributed across different locations.

We also love it if you have experience with <span class="highlight">React</span>, microservices, or Next.jsdefinitely a plus but not required.

This project is expected to take between 20-40 hours a week for about 2 months. If all goes well, theres definitely the potential for this to grow into a full-time, long-term gig.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp The role involves working on an existing application that integrates with various Amazon APIs. If you have a passion for both frontend and backend development, and youre looking for a part-time opportunity that could evolve into a full-time position, this is the perfect role for you.

Key Responsibilities:
		Develop and maintain the existing app used to connect to Amazon APIs, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
		Handle both frontend development using <span class="highlight">React</span> and backend tasks to ensure a seamless integration and functionality.
		Collaborate with our team to enhance the application based on user feedback and technical requirements.
		Work closely with other developers to integrate new features and optimize the applications performance.

Requirements:
		Strong proficiency in <span class="highlight">React</span> for front-end development, with a proven track record of building user-friendly interfaces.
		Ability to work on backend development and manage the full-stack development process.
		Availability during West Coast USA working hours for collaboration and team meetings.
		At least 20 hours of availability per week, with the potential for this role to evolve into a full-time position.
		Experience working with APIs, particularly Amazon APIs, is a strong advantage.

Preferred Skills:
		Strong communication skills, with the ability to work collaboratively in a remote environment.
		Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
		A proactive attitude towards problem-solving and improving user experiences.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp JobAttrs"><!----> <div The role involves implementing upsell features, applying dynamic discount logic, and enhancing the overall user experience by building responsive, mobile-optimized cart functionality. You'll be working closely with Shopify's APIs, JavaScript, AJAX, and GraphQL, with opportunities to leverage tools like Vite for modern development workflows. If you're skilled with frameworks like <span class="highlight">React</span> or Vue and have experience delivering intuitive, user-friendly interfaces, wed love to see what you can bring to our project.

We value clear communication, attention to detail, and collaborative teamwork. Our team operates in an agile environment with daily check-ins and bi-weekly sprint planning. We're looking for someone who can work efficiently, manage their time, and contribute to a fast-paced, results-driven project. If you're comfortable working independently, love building beautiful web experiences, and enjoy working in a supportive team atmosphere, we'd love to hear from you!</p></div> <!----></div> <div     </div></li></ul> <ul class="job-tile-info-list text-base-sm mb-4" data-test="JobInfo"><li data-test="job-type-label"><strong>Hourly: $15.00 - $45.00 </strong></li> <li data-test="experience-level"><strong>Intermediate</strong></li> <!----> <li data-test="duration-label"><strong class="mr-1">Est. time:</strong> <strong>3 to 6 months, Less than 30 hrs/week</strong></li></ul> <div data-ev-sublocation="!line_clamp" class="air3-line-clamp-wrapper clamp mb-3" style="--lines: 2; --line-clamp-expanded-height: false; --line-clamp-line-height: undefinedpx;" data-test="UpCLineClamp JobDescription"><!----> <div id="air3-line-clamp-29" tabindex="-1" class="air3-line-clamp is-clamped"><p class="mb-0 text-body-sm">Hello,

I am launching a new company using Sharetribe as my marketplace. I'm interested in hiring someone to the set up the NO-CODE aspects to my site and also help me prioritize which CODED sections need to happen first.

My platform is called The Hair Index - think Class Pass/Meets Event Brite/ with a sprinkling of Airbnb. This will be empowered by my current company The Left Brain Group. It will be a centralized destination to support indie talent in the pro beauty industry. Producers to the site are indie artists/educators who teach both virtual and in person workshops, Consumers are the pro beauty industry.

I've had an initial call with Sharetribe with my trial site and received some insight as to what would be NO CODE or CODED.

Key features to the site:
Index Directory - Listings of Profiles ( I would like to add CODE to offer a Premium Profile for a charge) which has some key search functions - like premium member, location, price, rating etc. Premium Profiles would have class descriptions, reviews and some additional things.

Calendar - which would be Listings where people can purchase directly the classes. I would also like key search functions like location, price, workshop focus.

Producer and Consumer Backends - likely some CODING for reporting

Long Term-would like a coded rewards program for Consumers

I would like to have a Beta to start pitching to Producers by Nov and then the site will be unveiled to Consumers at my event March 16-18th.

I have had a chance to play around a little bit in the trial, but for time saving purposes I think it would be effecient if someone can help me NO CODE and then come up with the CODED plan. Thank you. Looking forward to hearing from you.</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp JobAttrs"><!----> <div class="air3-token-wrap"  High-Impact, B2B SaaS Software Project 

Are you a Rockstar Developer ready to tackle a critical project with a tight deadline?
 We need your expertise in <span class="highlight">React</span> and <span class="highlight">React</span> Native to deliver a game-changing solution!


 How to Apply:
1. Submit your resume
2. Submit a link to your GitHub

 Overview:
We are a high-impact, B2B SaaS software company, and were looking for a Senior <span class="highlight">React</span> &amp; <span class="highlight">React</span> Native Developer with 10+ years of experience to jump in and support us on a critical project with a hard deadline in October. This is a fast-paced, high-stakes environmentperfect for someone who thrives under pressure and knows how to get the job done.


 What Youll Be Working With:
Tech Stack:
 <span class="highlight">React</span>
 <span class="highlight">React</span> Native
 <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span>
 Tailwind CSS

Tools:
 Jira for project management

Work Environment:
 Fast-paced, deadline-driven project


 What Were Looking For:
 1. 10+ years of experience with <span class="highlight">React</span> &amp; <span class="highlight">React</span> Native
 2. A+ unicorn  only the top-tier need apply
 3. Self-starter who can quickly integrate into the team and deliver value
 4. Ability to handle high workloads (think 40 sprint points like it's nothing!)

 Requirements:
 1. 10+ years of <span class="highlight">React</span> and <span class="highlight">React</span> Native experience in front-end development
 2. Expert-level proficiency in building and deploying scalable <span class="highlight">React</span> Native apps
 3. Strong experience with <span class="highlight">TypeScript</span> &amp; Tailwind CSS in production
 4. Proven ability to deliver under tight deadlines in high-pressure projects
 5. Expertise in writing clean, maintainable, and testable code
 6. Deep understanding of mobile app performance optimization and debugging
 7. Extensive GitHub portfolio or demonstrable work showcasing advanced projects
 8. Experience with API integration and complex state management (e.g., Redux)
 9. Self-sufficient problem solver with top-tier debugging skills
 10. Strong communication skills, English proficiency and a team-oriented approach

 How to Apply:
-- We are not jumping on a call to discuss the role at this point. We will review resumes and then select finalists for interview.
-- Your application MUST include the following to be considered:
 1. Submit your resume
 2. Submit a link to your GitHub



Start Date: ASAP 
Location:  Remote

 If youre ready for a high-stakes challenge, APPLY NOW and help us deliver this project on time!</p></div> <!----></div> <div class="air3-token-container" data-v-d8f62af2="" data-test="TokenClamp           </span> <div class="air3-icon md" data-test="UpCIcon"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" aria-hidden="true" viewBox="0 0 24 24" role="img"><path vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke" stroke="var(--icon-color, #001e00)" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="1.5" d="M9 6l5 6-5 6"></path></svg></div></button></li> <li class="air3-pagination-item-short"><!----></li> <li class="air3-pagination-item-boundary"><!----></li></ul> <div aria-live="polite" aria-atomic="true" class="sr-only">
